successful.title: Server Setup
successful.desc:
Server creation successful!
Use `/connection` to get the connection information.

setup.has_server: You already have a server! Use `/connection` to get the connection information.

dm.desc:

**Sharing this will let anyone fake votes for your server.**

connection.sent: Sent you a DM with connection information!
connection.dms_off: Could not DM you the connection information! Please enable your server DMs.

own.invalid: That server is not connected or does not exist!
